p: Since ancient times certain benefits of medicinal plants for healing purposes are known. Natural remedies, and especially medicinal plants, were the primary and even the only remedy available to doctors. Phytotherapy is known as the science that studies the application of products of plant origin with a rehabilitative purpose, be it for prevention, mitigate, or heal a pathological condition. It also refers to the intervention to recover health through the use of herbs with medicinal properties or their derivatives.[ 8 9]
